originalPrompt:
Create a stunning futuristic cityscape showing the AI Platform Factory Revolution!

Show towering glass and steel structures labeled "AImpact Nexus Orchestrator" that pulse with brilliant blue and cyan energy. These towers should be:
- Massive, crystalline spires reaching into the sky
- Filled with visible streams of flowing data as glowing light
- Holographic displays showing AI workforce coordination
- Connected by energy bridges carrying information flows
- Radiating power and revolutionary transformation

The scene should show:
- Traditional smokestacks and old factories crumbling in the foreground
- Dark, obsolete industrial structures being abandoned
- New digital towers rising from the ruins
- Bright contrast between old (gray, dark) and new (brilliant, glowing)
- Sense of massive transformation in progress

Visual effects:
- Pulsing energy throughout the Orchestrator towers
- Data streams flowing like rivers of light
- Holographic interfaces floating around the structures
- Revolutionary lighting that illuminates the entire landscape
- Epic scale showing the magnitude of this transformation

No text or labels - let the visual transformation speak for itself!
revisedPrompt: Imagine a dramatic shift in our architectural landscape. The scene unfolds with a futuristic cityscape, shadowing the remnants of a bygone era. Towering, grand structures made of glass and steel, radiate an attractive cyan and deep blue light, symbolizing the AI Platform Factory Revolution. Well-defined, these towers are colossal, crystalline spires reaching high into the sky, visibly streaming data embodied as glowing light. Holographic interfaces encapsulate these structures, a visual representation of ground-breaking AI coordination. An integrated network of energy bridges connects these monoliths, facilitating the constant exchange of information. In stark contrast lies the forgotten past ‚Äì time-worn factories with menacing smokestacks on the verge of crumbling, dark and obsolete, softly being consumed by the pioneering edifices. A bright sharp divergence exists between old and new, portraying a colossal shift. The entire scene breathes in the energy from the luminous arrays that fill the cityscape, visible proof of a massive transformation in progress. No names, no labels - the power of the visual ambiance is left to tell the tale of this revolution.
